Package com.ftdichip.ftd2xx

Class Summary
Device Represents the Device to access a particular the ft2xx device (e.g.
DeviceDescriptor Stores all data, describing a particular device.
DeviceDescriptorRev4 Extends the standard DeviceDescriptor with new fields available for revision 4 devices.
DeviceDescriptorRev5 Extends the DeviceDescriptorRev4 with new fields available for revision 5 devices.
EEPROM Provides access to a FTD2xx device`s EEPROM.
Port Provides access to a device`s serial port.
Service Utility class to retrieve and configure connected devices.
 

Enum Summary
BitBangMode Enumeration of all possible Bit Bang Modes .
DataBits Enumeration of valid data size values used for a Port`s data characteristics.
DeviceType Enumeration of all supported devices.
FlowControl Enumeration of valid flow control values.
FTStatus Enumeration of all known errors of the FTD2xx API.
ModemStatus Enumeration of possible modem status values.
Parity Enumeration of valid parity values.
StopBits Enumeration of valid stop bit values.
 

Exception Summary
EEPROMException Signals errors accessing a device`s EEPROM.
FTD2xxException Signals errors accessing a ftd2xx device.
InvalidDeviceDescriptorException Signals a DeviceDescriptorcontains invalid data.
